Title: Aftertaste
Plot: Devalos tries to reclaim the D.A.'s office.  Allison's support of Devalos is tested when she has visions of Senator Jed Garrity, Devalos' strongest political supporter, involved in a horrible conspiracy.
GuestStars: Gregory Itzin, Roger Aaron Brown, Arjay Smith, James Immekus, Sean Wing, Kevin Cooney, Barry Cullison, Lak Rana, Laura Eichhorn, Jacob Fishel, Bryan T. Donovan
